snippet.title: Wuppo: Definitive Edition Gameplay Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Pre-order: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/wuppo-definitive-edition-switch/
Pre-order EU/ME/Africa: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Wuppo-Definitive-Edition-1628871.html
Release: September 5th 2019
Wuppo: Definitive Edition will be available on:
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/wuppo-definitive-edition-switch/
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/400630/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/wuppo

Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.

FEATURES
- Explore a wondrous world filled with Wums, Fnakkers and other strange creatures.
- Resolve an ancient conflict on your quest for a new home.
- Use items and social skills to overcome diverse challenges.
- Fight numerous enemies, ranging from small, to big, to MASSIVE in an all new co-op mode!
- Collect filmstrips to discover the world's detailed history.
- Enjoy an enchanting and memorable orchestrated soundtrack.

----
Thanks for watching. Sharing would be greatly appreciated! ❤️

Created by Knuist & Perzik
Website: http://knuistperzik.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/knuistperzik
Discord: https://discord.gg/jmR2j2d

Wuppo website:
http://wuppogame.com


#Wuppo #NintendoSwitch #gameplay #trailer 2019 

Wuppo: Definitive Edition Gameplay Trailer
